title: Software Developer
description: I am a Software Developer working at Google on the Google Drive iOS application.

title: iOS Developer
description: I worked as an iOS Developer intern at Onshape. Learn more about Onshape at onshape.com.

title: Co-Founder and Lead iOS Developer
description: I was a co-founder and the Lead iOS Developer for Boolio. Boolio is a social questions app for iOS and Android. See more at boolio.io.

title: App Developer
description: I created Games for Pebble, an application for Pebble smartwatches. The application, coded in the C language, currently features seven games and has been installed over twenty thousand times. View the app here.

title: Android Developer
description: I was an Android developer for Response Care. Response Care helps caregivers provide quality care, safety and security for eldercare and senior living by providing state-of-the-art, reliable communications.
